title: Emergency Department-Initiated Buprenorphine for Opioid Use Disorder (EMBED)
desc: Emergency Department-Initiated Buprenorphine for Opioid Use Disorder (EMBED) assess OUD, opioid withdrawal, and treatment readiness for ED-initiated buprenorphine.

inputs.label_en:
How ready is the patient to start treatment with Buprenorphine today?

Brief Neogotiation Interview

inputs.label_en: Bipolar disorder, schizophrenia, OCD, or ADD history.

inputs.label_en: Do you have a waiver to prescribe Buprenorphine?
